thread.title: Micron’s Prospects Aren’t Micro

author: Spencer Jakab
title: Micron’s Prospects Aren’t Micro
text:
Lights, camera, action!
Micron Technology Inc. is ready for its close-up on Thursday and the slasher flick may nearly be over. Even if analysts haven’t cut their expectations for the chip maker’s fiscal full-year earnings report quite enough, catharsis probably isn’t far off.
It can’t come soon enough for hedge-fund manager David Einhorn of Greenlight Capital. He made a big bet on Micron and said back in July that he thought... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
